title: Identify the Unknown
text: The formula is $$d=rt$$, and we want to find $$t$$

title: Isolate
text: To solve for $$r$$, we can divide both sides by $$r$$ to isolate $$t$$, so we get $$t=\frac{d}{r}$$.
speech: To solve for  r , we can divide both sides by  r  to isolate  t , so we get  t is equal to d over r .
